name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and retro console buttons, it embodies the nostalgia of the past. Its arms and legs are designed with a unique 'hand down' feature, allowing it to perform intricate tasks with precision. The screen of RetroBot is equipped with a powerful laser, enabling it to project detailed waveforms and analyze data in real-time. Join RetroBot on its exciting journey through the digital realm!
